Marker ID.description: ArUco marker ID in the ArUco dictionary

Marker size.description: ArUco marker side length size of the black outer part

Marker X translation to parent.description: ArUco marker origin X translation to parent

Marker Y translation to parent.description: ArUco marker origin Y translation to parent

Marker Z translation to parent.description: ArUco marker origin Z translation to parent

Marker yaw rotation to parent degrees.description: ArUco marker origin yaw rotation to parent (in degrees)

Marker pitch rotation to parent degrees.description: ArUco marker origin pitch rotation to parent (in degrees)

Marker roll rotation to parent degrees.description: ArUco marker origin roll rotation to parent (in degrees)
